Interface CommissionLedgerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<CommissionLedger, Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<CommissionLedger, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<CommissionLedger, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<CommissionLedger, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<CommissionLedger, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<CommissionLedger>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<CommissionLedger, Long>
public interface CommissionLedgerRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<CommissionLedger, Long>
Repository interface for CommissionLedger entities, providing queries for commission tracking.

    • findByDoctorIdAndStatus

      List<CommissionLedger> findByDoctorIdAndStatus(Long doctorId, String status)
      Finds all commission records for a specific doctor with the given status.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor
      status - the payment status (e.g., "UNPAID", "PAID")
      Returns:
      list of CommissionLedger entries

    • getTotalCommissionByDoctorAndStatus

      @Query("SELECT COALESCE(SUM(c.calculatedAmount), 0) FROM CommissionLedger c WHERE c.doctor.id = :doctorId AND c.status = :status") BigDecimal getTotalCommissionByDoctorAndStatus(@Param("doctorId") Long doctorId, @Param("status") String status)
      Calculates total unpaid commission for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor
      status - the payment status
      Returns:
      total unpaid amount

    • getTotalCommissionByStatus

      @Query("SELECT COALESCE(SUM(c.calculatedAmount), 0) FROM CommissionLedger c WHERE c.status = :status") BigDecimal getTotalCommissionByStatus(@Param("status") String status)
      Calculates total commission for all doctors by status.
      Parameters:
      status - the payment status
      Returns:
      total amount
